trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around May 14th 2013
Summary: It was a bright orange ball with a small red ball then it turned into a large triangle object with 2 corners orange, one corner red and a large light in the center that turned off when almost out of view..
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my house with a buddy with a budd we went out to go to a conviencence store. I look up at an east direction and i see a small orange ball with a smaller red ball next to it. it acended and decended darted left and right then hastily flew up bought half a mile away from where we were standing it was a large triangle object makeing like rushing sound. it had 3 corners with lights, two corners were small and orange, one small and red and a lage orange light that turned off when almost out of view.
